text: Tapa'i thannuhuncha ki tiniharu bi'umjhirakheka chan, tara tiniharu nida'irakheka hunthe svayam hamile tiniharula'i dayam ra bamya kolte pharka'une gardathyaum ra tiniharuko ‘‘kukura’’ pani dailoma agadiko khutta phaila'era baseko thiyo yadi tapa'ile tiniharula'i ciya'era hereko bha'e pithyum pharka'era bhagnu pathryo ra tiniharuko darale tapa'ima bhayako srjana hune thiyo
